verbose_text: Regardless of the mechanism (s) of CD200 shedding, a functional significance for sCD200 was demonstrated by the ability of sCD200 to bind and phosphorylate CD200R1, the major receptor responsible for mediating the downstream immunoregulatory functions of CD200 [XREF_BIBR], using an anti-phosphotyrosine antibody specific for the active tyrosine residue in the CD200R1 tail [XREF_BIBR].
